# Autogenerated by tools/build/setup_cmake.py
# from tools/build/cmake_templates/ModuleLib.cmake
# Do not edit - any changes will be lost!

FILE(GLOB gensources
     "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/src/saxs/*.cpp")

FILE(GLOB genheaders
     "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/include/IMP/saxs/*.h")

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${HDF5_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${HDF5_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})
add_definitions("-DIMPSAXS_EXPORTS")

include(Files.cmake)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${OpenMP_CXX_FLAGS} ${SAXS_CXX_FLAGS}")

set(headers ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/ChiFreeScore.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/ChiScore.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/ChiScoreLog.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/DerivativeCalculator.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/Distribution.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/FitParameters.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/FormFactorTable.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/Profile.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/ProfileClustering.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/ProfileFitter.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/RadiusOfGyrationRestraint.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/RatioVolatilityScore.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/Restraint.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/RigidBodiesProfileHandler.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/SolventAccessibleSurface.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/WeightedFitParameters.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/WeightedProfileFitter.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/nnls.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/utility.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/utility_SAXSDom.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/internal/exp_function.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/internal/sinc_function.h
${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/include/internal/variance_helpers.h)

if(DEFINED IMP_saxs_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES)
  set_source_files_properties(${IMP_saxs_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
                              PROPERTIES GENERATED 1)
endif()
set_source_files_properties(${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/src/saxs_config.cpp
  PROPERTIES GENERATED 1)

if(DEFINED IMP_saxs_IS_CUDA)
  #  FILE(GLOB IMP_saxs_CUDA_SOURCES "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/src/*.cu")
  message(STATUS "Setting up cuda: " "${cudafiles}")
  FIND_PACKAGE(CUDA REQUIRED)
  INCLUDE(FindCUDA)
  LIST(APPEND CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS --compiler-options -fno-strict-aliasing -lineinfo -use_fast_math -Xptxas -dlcm=cg)
  LIST(APPEND CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS -gencode arch=compute_20,code=sm_20)
  LIST(APPEND CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS -gencode arch=compute_30,code=sm_30)
  LIST(APPEND CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS -gencode arch=compute_35,code=sm_35)
  set(sources ${cppfiles} ${cudafiles} )
  CUDA_ADD_LIBRARY(IMP.saxs-lib ${gensources} ${genheaders}
    ${headers} ${sources} ${cudasources}
    ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/src/saxs_config.cpp
    ${IMP_saxs_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
    ${IMP_LIB_TYPE}
    )
  target_link_libraries(IMP.saxs-lib ${CUDA_LIBRARIES} ${CUDA_curand_LIBRARY})
  message(STATUS "CUDA libraries: " "${CUDA_LIBRARIES}")
  message(STATUS "CUDA curand library: " "${CUDA_curand_LIBRARY}")
elseif(DEFINED IMP_saxs_IS_PER_CPP)
  set(sources ${cppfiles})
  add_library(IMP.saxs-lib  ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${sources}
              ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/src/saxs_config.cpp
              ${IMP_saxs_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )
else()
  add_library(IMP.saxs-lib  ${IMP_LIB_TYPE} ${gensources} ${genheaders}
              ${headers} ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/src/saxs_all.cpp
              ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/src/saxs_config.cpp
              ${IMP_saxs_LIBRARY_EXTRA_SOURCES}
              )
endif()
set_target_properties(IMP.saxs-lib PROPERTIES
                      OUTPUT_NAME imp_saxs)

# Note that soversion is only set if a version is set in the *source* directory.
# This is because we have to set soversion at cmake, not build, time. All stable
# releases have a VERSION file in the source directory, so this should be OK.
IF (EXISTS ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/VERSION)
  file(STRINGS ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/saxs/VERSION sover
       REGEX "^[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+(\\.[0-9]+)?$")
ELSEIF(EXISTS ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/VERSION)
  file(STRINGS ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/VERSION sover
       REGEX "^[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+(\\.[0-9]+)?$")
ENDIF()
IF (NOT "${sover}" STREQUAL "")
  set_target_properties(IMP.saxs-lib PROPERTIES
                        VERSION ${sover} SOVERSION ${sover})
ELSE()
  set_target_properties(IMP.saxs-lib PROPERTIES
                        VERSION 0 SOVERSION 0)
ENDIF()

set_property(TARGET "IMP.saxs-lib" PROPERTY FOLDER "IMP.saxs")

INSTALL(TARGETS IMP.saxs-lib DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR})

add_dependencies(IMP.saxs-lib IMP.saxs-version)

if(DEFINED IMP_saxs_LIBRARY_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES)
  add_dependencies(IMP.saxs-lib ${IMP_saxs_LIBRARY_EXTRA_DEPENDENCIES})
endif()

target_link_libraries(IMP.saxs-lib ${imp_saxs_libs})



set(IMP_saxs_LIBRARY IMP.saxs-lib CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
